title: Hextech question

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
so i recently got an S on{{champion:7}} and{{champion:131}}  i linked the LeBlanc game but unfortunately i didn't have any chest charges when i got them so my question is do i get chests for those S es when i get other charges i am asking just out of curiosity
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
If you don't have a chest **available** at the moment you earn an S-grade performance, you **will not** receive a chest for that performance. Check out our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for more info.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
